sancharaka karmanthaya aashritha aadayam ihala nanwima sandaha ganika wruththiya merata nithi gatha karanayi kolao maha nagara sabhawe nagarika manthri dhushantha malagoda mahatha illimak keleya.shri lankawe pradhana aadayam margaya bawata sancharaka karmanthaya path wemin thibena bawath eeta dayakathwaya laba dima sandaha kolao nagarayata awashya siyalu pahasukam salasiya yuthu bawath ki ee mahatha sancharaka karmanthaye maramasthanaya wana kolao nagaraya punchi singappuruwak bawata path kala yuthu bawath sandahan keleya.kolombu ef .em namin nawa guwan widuli sewayak kolao maha nagara sima bala pradeshaye kriyathmaka kala yuthu bawata aariyaraththa santhiyago mahatha wisin eeye(30)da kolao maha nagara sabhawata karana lada yojanawedi malagoda mahatha ese kiya.ema yojanawa erik chandrasena (ejanisa)mahatha wisin sthira keleya.aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha samanga nagaradhipathiwaraya athwal badagena kolao nagaraye sanwardhana wadapiliwela aashcharya kara gena yana bawada malagoda mahatha pawasiya.thama nagaradhipathi dhuraye sitiyadi ganika wruththiya nithigatha kirimata kisiseth ida nodena bawa kolao maha nagara sabhawe purapathi ee .je .em musammil mahatha awadharanaya keleya.rate aarthikaya goda nangima sandaha awurudu 2600 ka prauda ithihasayakata himikam kiyana shri lankawa ewani thaththwayakata path wiya yuthu nathayi ki ee mahatha shri lankikayangen bahutharaya aagama dahamata ladi bawa sandahan keleya..
